sentences.en: A lone cow peers through a burned - out tree on a grassy paddock in Bermagui.
sentences.cn: 贝玛圭草场上,一头孤独奶牛的视线穿过一棵被烧坏的树干.

sentences.en: Cost cutting has been the talk of the paddock for years, with apparently mixed results.
sentences.cn: 成本节约数年来都是维修区中的话题, 结果无疑也存在着多样化的特征.

sentences.en: East from its paddock Mu - lan , Fengning dam, Guyuan original prairie, Zhang north west grassland.
sentences.cn: 它东起木兰围场 、 丰宁坝上 、 沽源原始草原, 西至张北草原.

sentences.en: He frankly preferred the paddock, and took a deal of catching.
sentences.cn: 吃饭时, 蟾蜍信口开河高谈阔论.

sentences.en: He keeps horses in a paddock behind his house.
sentences.cn: 他把马养在屋后的小围场里.

sentences.en: I rode bareback to the paddock.
sentences.cn: 我骑着无鞍马来到了牧场。

sentences.en: It was nice to see my old friend Mika in the paddock with his little son.
sentences.cn: 在围场里面看到老朋友哈基宁和他的儿子真开心.

sentences.en: Magnolia paddock called Saihanba Forest Park.
sentences.cn: 木兰围场又称塞罕坝森林公园.

sentences.en: Paddock: Yeah, you're supposed to be off finding some castle on the road to Cherbourg.
sentences.cn: 派多克: 是啊, 你们打算去瑟堡,一路上会发现一些城堡.

sentences.en: Q: Cost cutting has been the talk of the paddock for years, with apparently mixed results.
sentences.cn: 问: 成本节约数年来都是维修区中的话题, 结果无疑也存在着多样化的特征.

sentences.en: Schumacher and his Benetton team were not the most popular in the paddock.
sentences.cn: 但舒马赫和他所在的贝纳通车队在当时的赛车场并非最受欢迎.

sentences.en: Tai Shan also rolls around in the outdoor paddock and climbs trees, delighting zoo visitors.
sentences.cn: “泰山”经常在户外的空地上打滚或者爬树, 逗乐了动物园的游客.

sentences.en: The family kept horses in the paddock in front of the house.
sentences.cn: 那户人家把马养在屋前的小围场里。

sentences.en: Vaulting the stile, he headed diagonally across the paddock.
sentences.cn: 翻身跃过栅栏后，他便朝斜穿围场的方向走去。

trans.tran_en: a small field in which horses are kept
